name: HiCustomer, Inc.
description: Developer of a customer success platform designed to offer management tools to improve customer relationships. The company's platform aggregates and visualizes customer information such as usage status, communication history, sales, contact information, and many more, enabling clients to fully utilize the resources of their customer success team.
